CafePoisoning.title: CafePoisoning
CafePoisoning.description: CafePoisoning is a Medium-difficulty DFIR sherlock featuring ARP poisoning/MITM attacks on public Wi-Fi, DNS spoofing, reverse engineering malware, C2 communication analysis, PowerShell AV evasion, and screensaver-based registry persistence mechanisms.

Caught.title: Caught
Caught.description: Caught is a Hard-difficulty DFIR sherlock featuring insider threat via AD exploitation, multi-stage JScript deserialization attacks, Sliver C2, AD privilege escalation chains (GenericAll→GenericWrite→GPO abuse), attacker artifacts analysis, and WMI event consumer persistence.

SalineBreeze-1.title: SalineBreeze-1
SalineBreeze-1.description: SalineBreeze-1 is a very easy-difficulty threat intelligence sherlock involving OSINT research on the Salt Typhoon APT group, utilizing MITRE ATT&CK framework to map TTPs, analyzing malware like GhostSpider and Demodex rootkit, and investigating CVEs used in telecom attacks.

Malevolent ModMaker.title: Malevolent ModMaker
Malevolent ModMaker.description: Malevolent ModMaker is a medium-difficulty Malware Analysis sherlock focusing on reverse engineering a Go-based ransomware dropper, analyzing Discord C2 webhooks, examining AES-GCM encryption implementation, and decrypting victim files.

GateKeeper.title: GateKeeper
GateKeeper.description: GateKeeper is a hard-difficulty DFIR sherlock featuring analysis of a compromised Mac system, investigating Gatekeeper bypass via CVE-2022-22616, privilege escalation through CVE-2019-8513, parsing unified logs and Safari artifacts, and mapping attacker TTPs.

Interceptor.title: Interceptor
Interceptor.description: Interceptor is an easy-difficulty SOC sherlock involving PCAP analysis of an SSLoad malware infection, tracing malicious MSI downloads via WebDAV, decrypting RC4-encrypted C2 communications, and identifying compromised system details.

WhyFind.title: WhyFind
WhyFind.description: WhyFind is an easy-difficulty DFIR sherlock focusing on analysis of a KAPE output, Windows registry examination, network profile analysis, MFT journal parsing, browser artifact extraction, and VM creation investigation.

Cuidado.title: Cuidado
Cuidado.description: Cuidado is an easy-difficulty SOC sherlock featuring analysis of a cryptocurrency miner infection using a PCAP file, tracing malicious downloads, dissecting bash droppers, unpacking UPX-compressed payloads, and identifying attacker TTPs

ElectricBreeze-2.title: ElectricBreeze-2
ElectricBreeze-2.description: ElectricBreeze-2 is an easy-difficulty Malware Analysis sherlock involving static analysis of a Volt Typhoon JAR malware sample, examining web shell functionality, encryption methods, and credential theft mechanisms.

ReachKart.title: ReachKart
ReachKart.description: ReackKart is a medium-difficulty DFIR sherlock focusing on blockchain technology incident response, featuring LFI exploitation analysis, network packet analysis, database forensics, and cryptocurrency theft tracking.

Zenith.title: Zenith
Zenith.description: Zenith is an easy-difficulty DFIR sherlock featuring malicious email analysis, embedded malware extraction, reverse engineering persistence mechanisms, and tracking privilege escalation through Windows event logs.

Payload.title: Payload
Payload.description: Payload is an easy-difficulty Malware Analysis sherlock involving analysis of a Windows executable compiled with MingW, and dynamic analysis of this malware with x64WinDbg to skip the complex decryption procedure and uncover the payload.

Streamer.title: Streamer
Streamer.description: Streamer is a hard-difficulty DFIR sherlock focusing on Internet Explorer WebCache analysis, Amcache.hve file parsing, Using Windows Event Logs to uncover traffic, Using MFTECmd to recover file contents, and parsing ShellBags to discover user activity.

Trojan.title: Trojan
Trojan.description: Trojan is an easy-difficulty DFIR sherlock featuring artifact analysis, prefetch file parsing, memory dump investigation with volatility, extracting malware from a PCAP file, and using public sources to learn more about the malware.

APTNightmare-2.title: APTNightmare-2
APTNightmare-2.description: APTNightmare-2 is a hard-difficulty DFIR sherlock involving analysis of a memory dump with volatility2, importing a profile, finding hidden processes, discovering a rootkit, and reverse engineering the malware to uncover its functionality.

CrewCrow.title: CrewCrow
CrewCrow.description: CrewCrow is a medium-difficulty DFIR sherlock focusing on extracting Zoom artifacts, decrypting DPAPI credentials, cracking NTLM hashes, decrypting Zoom encrypted databases to recover meeting IDs/passwords, and uncovering a planned operation’s origin.

RomCom.title: RomCom
RomCom.description: RomCom is a very easy-difficulty DFIR sherlock featuring CVE-2025-8088 abuse examination, UsnJournal and $MFT parsing, and pinpointing the timestamps of crucial events.

ElectricBreeze-1.title: ElectricBreeze-1
ElectricBreeze-1.description: ElectricBreeze-1 is a very easy-difficulty TI sherlock involving usage of the MITRE ATT&CK framework to learn more about the malicious group, and reading publicly available articles to gather crucial information.

DroidPhish.title: DroidPhish
DroidPhish.description: DroidPhish is an easy-difficulty DFIR sherlock focusing on analysis of a phishing incident, discovering a suspicious email message, and investigating a malicious APK file.

Unsupervised.title: Unsupervised
Unsupervised.description: Unsupervised is a medium-difficulty DFIR sherlock featuring windows registry exploration, enumeration of registered USB drives, investigating jump lists for copied files and analyzing thumbcache databases.

Anpu.title: Anpu
Anpu.description: Anpu is a medium-difficulty DFIR sherlock involving analysis of a multi-purpose trojan distributed via Discord, examining overlay attacks and ransomware capabilities through Android forensics and APK reverse engineering.

PercyPay.title: PercyPay
PercyPay.description: PercyPay is an easy-difficulty Cloud sherlock focusing on log analysis of an attack chain involving credential exposure, privilege escalation through Lambda functions, security evasion, and customer data exfiltration.

TeamWork.title: TeamWork
TeamWork.description: TeamWork is an easy-difficulty TI sherlock featuring analysis of a social engineering campaign, investigating fake NFT gaming infrastructure, tracing malicious files through archived websites, and mapping the TA's tactics.

ReliableThreat.title: ReliableThreat
ReliableThreat.description: ReliableThreat is a medium-difficulty DFIR sherlock focusing on tracing a malicious VSCode extension infection chain, analyzing the malware files, pinpointing the attacker's actions and describing the techniques they used.

Origins.title: Origins
Origins.description: Origins is a very easy-difficulty DFIR sherlock involving analysis of a PCAP file, discovering a successful bruteforce attack targeting FTP, and assessing the potential impact of the attack,

Kuber.title: Kuber
Kuber.description: Kuber is an easy-difficulty DFIR sherlock featuring Kubernetes cluster examination, and finding a malicious pod.

Loggy.title: Loggy
Loggy.description: Loggy is an easy-difficulty malware analysis sherlock focusing on reverse engineering of a keylogger written in Golang, analyzing its data exfiltration mechanisms and extracting compromised credentials.

Psittaciformes.title: Psittaciformes
Psittaciformes.description: Psittaciformes is an easy-difficulty DFIR sherlock involving log analysis, bash history forensics, git repository analysis and code review.

Compromised.title: Compromised
Compromised.description: Compromised is an easy-difficulty SOC sherlock involving PCAP analysis of a Pikabot malware infection, focusing on initial access vectors and C2 infrastructure identification.
